collection_holder_name: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
pageContext.collection_description: Contains over 14,000 transcription discs focusing on country music, including syndicated radio shows. Also includes a large collection of AFRS transcription discs. Programs represented in the collection include: Grand Ole Opry, Prince Albert Show, Eddie Arnold Show, Checkerboard Jamboree, Ralph Emory Show, American Country Countdown, Radio Ozark and other syndicated shows.
